label: A2BC2_hP5_164_d_a_d-001
title: Brucite [Mg(OH)$_{2}$] Structure
comments: We used the data from (Catti, 1995) at ambient pressure.  In some Brucite-like materials the hydrogen atoms are displaced to the (6i) Wyckoff positions $(x,-x,z)$ of space group $P3m1$ \#164, and these sites are 1/3 occupied.
